bit_field_value.name: TCR_TCR_0b00000000
bit_field_value.description: Time Prescaler Register overflows every 32768 clock cycles.

bit_field_value.name: TCR_TCR_0b00000001
bit_field_value.description: Time Prescaler Register overflows every 32767 clock cycles.

bit_field_value.name: TCR_TCR_0b01111111
bit_field_value.description: Time Prescaler Register overflows every 32641 clock cycles.

bit_field_value.name: TCR_TCR_0b10000000
bit_field_value.description: Time Prescaler Register overflows every 32896 clock cycles.

bit_field_value.name: TCR_TCR_0b11111111
bit_field_value.description: Time Prescaler Register overflows every 32769 clock cycles.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SWR_NO_EFFECT
bit_field_value.description: No effect.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SWR_RESET
bit_field_value.description: Resets all RTC registers except for the SWR bit and the RTC_WAR and RTC_RAR registers . The SWR bit is cleared by VBAT POR and by software explicitly clearing it.

bit_field_value.name: CR_WPE_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Wakeup pin is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CR_WPE_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Wakeup pin is enabled and wakeup pin asserts if the RTC interrupt asserts or the wakeup pin is turned on.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SUP_NON_SUPPORTED
bit_field_value.description: Non-supervisor mode write accesses are not supported and generate a bus error.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SUP_SUPPORTED
bit_field_value.description: Non-supervisor mode write accesses are supported.

bit_field_value.name: CR_UM_PROTECTED
bit_field_value.description: Registers cannot be written when locked.

bit_field_value.name: CR_UM_WRITEABLE
bit_field_value.description: Registers can be written when locked under limited conditions.

bit_field_value.name: CR_WPS_ASSERTED
bit_field_value.description: Wakeup pin asserts (active low, open drain) if the RTC interrupt asserts or the wakeup pin is turned on.

bit_field_value.name: CR_WPS_RTC_32KHZ
bit_field_value.description: Wakeup pin instead outputs the RTC 32kHz clock, provided the wakeup pin is turned on and the 32kHz clock is output to other peripherals.

bit_field_value.name: CR_OSCE_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: 32.768 kHz oscillator is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CR_OSCE_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: 32.768 kHz oscillator is enabled. After setting this bit, wait the oscillator startup time before enabling the time counter to allow the 32.768 kHz clock time to stabilize.

bit_field_value.name: CR_CLKO_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: The 32 kHz clock is output to other peripherals.

bit_field_value.name: CR_CLKO_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: The 32 kHz clock is not output to other peripherals.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SC16P_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Disable the load.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SC16P_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Enable the additional load.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SC8P_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Disable the load.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SC8P_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Enable the additional load.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SC4P_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Disable the load.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SC4P_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Enable the additional load.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SC2P_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Disable the load.

bit_field_value.name: CR_SC2P_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Enable the additional load.

bit_field_value.name: SR_TIF_VALID
bit_field_value.description: Time is valid.

bit_field_value.name: SR_TIF_INVALID
bit_field_value.description: Time is invalid and time counter is read as zero.

bit_field_value.name: SR_TOF_NOT_OCCURED
bit_field_value.description: Time overflow has not occurred.

bit_field_value.name: SR_TOF_OCCURED
bit_field_value.description: Time overflow has occurred and time counter is read as zero.

bit_field_value.name: SR_TAF_NOT_OCCURED
bit_field_value.description: Time alarm has not occurred.

bit_field_value.name: SR_TAF_OCCURED
bit_field_value.description: Time alarm has occurred.

bit_field_value.name: SR_MOF_NOT_OCCURED
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic counter overflow has not occurred.

bit_field_value.name: SR_MOF_OCCURED
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic counter overflow has occurred and monotonic counter is read as zero.

bit_field_value.name: SR_TCE_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Time counter is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: SR_TCE_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Time counter is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: LR_TCL_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Time Compensation Register is locked and writes are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: LR_TCL_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Time Compensation Register is not locked and writes complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: LR_CRL_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Control Register is locked and writes are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: LR_CRL_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Control Register is not locked and writes complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: LR_SRL_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Status Register is locked and writes are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: LR_SRL_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Status Register is not locked and writes complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: LR_LRL_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Lock Register is locked and writes are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: LR_LRL_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Lock Register is not locked and writes complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: LR_TTSL_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Tamper Time Seconds Register is locked and writes are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: LR_TTSL_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Tamper Time Seconds Register is not locked and writes complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: LR_MEL_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic Enable Register is locked and writes are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: LR_MEL_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic Enable Register is not locked and writes complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: LR_MCLL_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic Counter Low Register is locked and writes are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: LR_MCLL_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic Counter Low Register is not locked and writes complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: LR_MCHL_LOCKED
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic Counter High Register is locked and writes are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: LR_MCHL_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic Counter High Register is not locked and writes complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: IER_TIIE_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Time invalid flag does not generate an interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: IER_TIIE_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Time invalid flag does generate an interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: IER_TOIE_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Time overflow flag does not generate an interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: IER_TOIE_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Time overflow flag does generate an interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: IER_TAIE_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Time alarm flag does not generate an interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: IER_TAIE_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Time alarm flag does generate an interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: IER_MOIE_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic overflow flag does not generate an interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: IER_MOIE_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Monotonic overflow flag does generate an interrupt.

bit_field_value.name: IER_TSIE_DISABLED
bit_field_value.description: Seconds interrupt is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: IER_TSIE_ENABLED
bit_field_value.description: Seconds interrupt is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: IER_WPON_NO_EFFECT
bit_field_value.description: No effect.

bit_field_value.name: IER_WPON_ON
bit_field_value.description: If the wakeup pin is enabled, then the wakeup pin will assert.

bit_field_value.name: MER_MCE_WRITTEN
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the monotonic counter load the counter with the value written.

bit_field_value.name: MER_MCE_INCREMENT
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the monotonic counter increment the counter.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TSRW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Time Seconds Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TSRW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Time Seconds Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TPRW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Time Prescaler Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TPRW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Time Prescaler Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TARW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Time Alarm Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TARW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Time Alarm Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TCRW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Time Compensation Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TCRW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Time Compensation Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_CRW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Control Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_CRW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Control Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_SRW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Status Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_SRW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Status Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_LRW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Lock Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_LRW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Lock Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_IERW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Interupt Enable Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_IERW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Interrupt Enable Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TTSW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Tamper Time Seconds Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_TTSW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Tamper Time Seconds Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_MERW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Monotonic Enable Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_MERW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Monotonic Enable Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_MCLW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Monotonic Counter Low Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_MCLW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Monotonic Counter Low Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_MCHW_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Monotonic Counter High Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: WAR_MCHW_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Writes to the Monotonic Counter High Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TSRR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Time Seconds Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TSRR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Time Seconds Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TPRR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Time Pprescaler Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TPRR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Time Prescaler Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TARR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Time Alarm Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TARR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Time Alarm Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TCRR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Time Compensation Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TCRR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Time Compensation Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_CRR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Control Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_CRR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Control Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_SRR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Status Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_SRR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Status Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_LRR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Lock Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_LRR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Lock Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_IERR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Interrupt Enable Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_IERR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Interrupt Enable Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TTSR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Tamper Time Seconds Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_TTSR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Tamper Time Seconds Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_MERR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Monotonic Enable Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_MERR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Monotonic Enable Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_MCLR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Monotonic Counter Low Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_MCLR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Monotonic Counter Low Register complete as normal.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_MCHR_IGNORED
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Monotonic Counter High Register are ignored.

bit_field_value.name: RAR_MCHR_NORMAL
bit_field_value.description: Reads to the Monotonic Counter High Register complete as normal.
